New Records: The Dodgers' 33-inning postseason scoreless streak ended quickly
Key Match Events: Ryan Brasier gave up a leadoff home run to Francisco Lindor
Landon Knack gave up a five-run second inning
Mark Vientos hit a grand slam
Kiké Hernández twice came up empty while representing the tying or go-ahead run
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers decided to go with a bullpen game in Game 2 of the National League Championship Series
The club wanted to save Walker Buehler for Game 3 in New York
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dave Roberts said the plan Monday was always to use Landon Knack early in the game
The team's top three relievers — Michael Kopech, Blake Treinen and Evan Phillips — will enter Game 3 on four days' rest
Outfielder Mookie Betts said the series would be a long, tough series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers can only hope their starting rotation avoids the same fate in Game 3
The Game 4 matchup could be a toss-up between Walker Buehler and Luis Severino
